title: Relates to the qualifications of operators of health facilities
summary: Relates to the qualifications of operators of health facilities; requires the consideration of past labor transgressions when granting, renewing, revoking, etc. certificates of operation/applications to hospitals, nursing homes, HMOs, and health care services agencies.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the qualifications of operators of health facilities
